DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Cotton Flocked Swabs Vaginal Self Collection
DOC.detailed_description: Vaginal self-sampling Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) test propose efficient method cover hard-to reach population develop country . While recent cheap cotton swab traditionally use deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) detection , recent study question efficacy reporting superiority expensive flock swab . The objective study compare performance cotton v flock swabs cellular retrieval HPV DNA quantification vaginal self-sampling . A total 120 woman recruit . Inclusion criterion follow : 21 year age old , attend colposcopy clinic , understand study procedure able comply study protocol . Pregnant woman , previously total hysterectomy , woman ongoing menstruation exclude . Each woman collect two different vaginal self sample : one cotton swab one flocked swab . Subsequently , flow cytometric analysis , well real time PCR analysis cytologic evaluation specimen adequacy run sample . Agreement two method calculate use kappa statistic ( Îº ) .
DOC.criteria: attend colposcopy clinic accepts voluntarily take part study sign inform consent form pregnancy previous hysterectomy ongoing menstruation
